data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 8
data.actual_result: It still shows a "Sent" button with no option to send another friend request.
data.expected_result: It will give you the option to send a second friend request.
data.short_description: Nearby Friends: You are not able to send a second friend request when the first one was ignored
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have 2 accounts and iOS devices - Go the friends tab - Click on the add friends symbol - Search for nearby friends with both devices - Send a friend request - Ignore it via the pending tab - Close the friends tab - Open it again and search for nearby friends - Observe the send button
